episodes.title: Combating Cult Mind Control
episodes.description:
Today I talk about Combatting Cult Mind Control, a book by Steven Hassan.

Dr. Steven Hassan's website : https://freedomofmind.com/
The B.I.T.E Model: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=_Pvpd6wCeM4&t=9s
Thought Reform and the Psychology of Totalism : https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thought_Reform_and_the_Psychology_of_Totalism

#cultawareness #cults #freedomofmind #mindcontrol #books #booktube
